definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

pinyin: Tu3 er3 qi2 xuan2 zhuan3 kao3 rou4

definition: merry-go-round/carousel/Carousel, South Korean TV soap opera

pinyin: xuan2 zhuan3 xing2 li5 chuan2 song4 dai4

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)

sentences.english: Revolving pushing is one of the methods of pushing shot.
sentences.chinese: 旋转推铅是推铅球的方法之一。

sentences.english: The receptive apex of the pistil of a flower, on which pollen is deposited at pollination.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊花柱顶部，授粉时花粉被旋转于此。

sentences.english: Air whips past the blades of a turbine, forcing it to spin.
sentences.chinese: 经过风轮叶片的空气迫使风轮旋转，风轮驱动电机。

sentences.english: Spin me around til I fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 抱着我旋转直到我睡着。

sentences.english: Keep the cable coils stacked in the same order as they were when they were on the drum.
sentences.chinese: 在鼓轮上保持钢索盘的旋转方向与原来一致。

sentences.english: The twisting and moving slowed down, halting the lights.
sentences.chinese: 星云旋转和转动的速度降了下来，亮度也变暗了。

sentences.english: Octahedron slurry pond in the upper intermittent rotation.
sentences.chinese: 八面体在浆池上方间歇性旋转。

sentences.english: OK.What about other kinds of rotations?
sentences.chinese: 那其他的旋转是怎样的呢？

sentences.english: The rotating sphere shows the current pitch and bank angles.
sentences.chinese: 旋转的球体表示了当前的俯仰角和坡度角。

sentences.english: The axis of rotation and its support are part of the central pedestal.
sentences.chinese: 旋转轴和它的支撑结构是中央操作台的一部分。

sentences.english: The role of lead car has been rotated which is great and a bit of fun.
sentences.chinese: 领队的车已被旋转的作用是一个伟大的一点乐趣。

sentences.english: Omega equals 2pi times the spin frequency.
Both areas have front access with pivoting doors, and are accessed via glass doors.
sentences.chinese: 两个区域都有带旋转门的正面通道，通过玻璃门出入。

sentences.english: And, that radius rotates around the wheel as the wheel is moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 这条半径随着车轮的向前移动在旋转着。

sentences.english: Rotate the left arm forward while inhaling.
The shape of falling raindrops can be approximately treated as spheroids.
sentences.chinese: 下落雨滴的形状可以近似地用旋转椭球体来处理。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to rotate/to twirl/to run around/to encircle/rotation/(coll.) to speak indirectly/to beat about the bush
to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
to spin rapidly/to whirl around/(of time) to fly by
